page.title: 18MEDIA IN WOODLAND
page.content: Some people have two{televisions}and a few have{videos}about eight people have{computers.}We use televison and a computer in school but we do not have a video. Most people go down to the shop to buy a{newspaper}others get theirs delivered.The most popular daily papers are The Northen Echo and Daily Mirror.Most popular weekly papers are Teesdale Mercury and Darlington & Stockton Times.The most popular Sunday papers are Sunday Post and Sunday People.Popular{magazines}are Womans Own,Womens Weekly,TV Times,Radio Times and Farming. { Comics}in order of popularity are Mandy,Look In,Girl,Jacky and Patches. Recent{news events}on television have been famine in Etheopia, the miners strike which caused hardship. Disaster in Bangladesh caused by a cyclone.
